amendment.description: Amendment gives a state two years to become compliant with the new waters definition of the U.S. rule in order to protect a state from automatically losing its state permitting programs through the Clean Water Act because of the new rule.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 114-231 to give a state two years to become compliant with the new waters of the U.S. rule in order to protect a state from automatically losing their state permitting programs through the Clean Water Act because of the new rule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Kildee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
